description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: User enumeration can occur in the Authentication REST API in Delinea PAM Secret Server 11.4. This allows a remote attacker to determine whether a user is valid because of a difference in responses from the /oauth2/token endpoint.

La enumeración de usuarios puede ocurrir en la API REST de autenticación en Delinea PAM Secret Server 11.4. Esto permite a un atacante remoto determinar si un usuario es válido debido a una diferencia en las respuestas del endpoint /oauth2/token.
